Reinach, BL, Switzerland 10th Edition
8 Bands competed (mixed Brass/Wind).

Prize Money: 1st CHF 800.-, 2nd 500.-, 3rd 300.-
May 26, 2016, 1:42 p.m. June 13, 2017, 5:31 p.m.
